alert.note: Alert for Miami (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 2:07AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Miami, Cass, northwestern Henry, northern Bates and southwestern Johnson Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 207 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Louisburg, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harrisonville, Paola, Peculiar, Osawatomie, Louisburg, Holden, Adrian, Garden City, Archie, Drexel, Cleveland, Urich, Freeman, Creighton, Chilhowee, East Lynne, Kingsville, Fontana, Lake Annette and Strasburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
